txt.en: Collect the supplies next to Prince Ingór
'I am here to honour my word.'
'We must be the ones to retake our Mountain-home!'
Maergrind, the Noble Gate of Máttugard, can be found in Gundabad.\n\nYou should deliver expedition supplies to those at Maergrind.
'Ah, [placeholder]! I myself have just arrived! There is much to build and much to forge, just as others forge a path forward through the Mountain-home!'
'Thank you for the supplies. There seems to be much in Gundabad to explore. Adventure surely awaits those who seek it!'
Now you should deliver the supplies throughout Maergrind

'Thank you, [placeholder]. Yes, I am here to honour my word. I will see the goal of the dwarves to retake Gundabad is accomplished. It is the least I can do, for the dwarves of Moria have taught me much.'
Maergrind, the Noble Gate of Máttugard, can be found in Gundabad.\n\nYou should collect the supplies next to Prince Ingór.
Deliver expedition supplies to those at Maergrind ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
You delivered supplies for the expedition to those who needed them.
The Expedition of the Mighty Court

'Greetings, and thank you for the supplies. I am here to assist Grámi Hornhelm. Wherever he goes I will follow, for I still have much to learn of the forge from Grámi's skillful hands and his patient instruction.'

'Now then, let us progress the expedition further into Gundabad. We cannot just wait around... we must be the ones to retake the Mountain-home! Take these expedition supplies and distribute them throughout Maergrind. I will soon undertake an expedition myself to retake Zidir-nesad, the Steepset, on the far side of Máttugard. Perhaps I will see you there soon, [placeholder].'
Prince Ingór wishes to advance the expedition further into Máttugard.
You have successfully delivered the expedition supplies for Prince Ingór and heard from those who wish to explore further into Máttugard. Now the path through Gundabad is up to you.
